__e: Those bloody Krauts-- they think of everything.
He was killed by the Krauts
If you wait a minute, the Krauts'll probably save you the trouble.
I don't know where the Krauts are!
He says the Germans aren't there.
Ask them if they know where the Germans are.
Perhaps, but they are going to fight Germans, and that is what I am going to do:
You joy-ride with the Boches and I get hell!
All the best has been requisitioned, first by the German army, then by your army.
There's a list with all of our names on it and the Germans have it.
As you say, a lot of the Germans have the same faculty, yes?
They thought the Germans must be mixed up in it.
His grandfather took it from a German soldier during the war.
I saw women and children dying... killed by German soldiers.
Just keep those Germans away from us.
In truth, I tell you, the Germans do not act like us, neither do they think like us, for they are not, like us, children of God.
He told me he doesn't agree with the Germans
